title: First Ride and Build: The Factor Ostro VAM Is Faster Than a Specialized Tarmac
content:
Believe it or not but Factor says their race road bike is faster and lighter than ever before. Our build and first impressions of everything new here.

Read the full article at First Ride and Build: The Factor Ostro VAM Is Faster Than a Specialized Tarmac on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
